trans-unit.source: Represents the parameters for an SSL security token that is obtained when doing the SOAP-level SSL protocol with the server.
trans-unit.target: 表示與伺服器的 SOAP 層級的 SSL 通訊協定時所取得的 SSL 安全性權杖的參數。

trans-unit.source: This class is a collection of token properties and methods, and is used in creating security binding elements and tokens.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別是權杖屬性及方法的集合，而且會用於建立安全性繫結項目和權杖。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The new instance property values are set to their defaults: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode>.
trans-unit.target: 新的執行個體屬性值會設定為其預設值:-<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A>設為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.ReferenceStyle%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle>.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.ReferenceStyle%2A>設定為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.ReferenceStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> is set to `true`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A>

trans-unit.target: 新的執行個體屬性值會設定為其預設值:-<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A>設為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> is set to `true`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireCancellation%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireCancellation%2A>設定為`false`。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireCancellation%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireClientCertificate%2A>設定為`requireClientCertificate`。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireClientCertificate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to require client certificate; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要求用戶端憑證。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 新的執行個體屬性值會設定中的對應值`other`。

trans-unit.target: 其他這個類別執行個體。

trans-unit.source: other is .
trans-unit.target: otheris .

trans-unit.source: Clones another instance of this instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: 複製類別的這個執行個體的另一個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.Clone%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.CloneCore%2A> methods follow the Core design pattern.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.Clone%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.CloneCore%2A>方法符合核心設計模式。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.CloneCore%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: CloneCore overrides <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.CloneCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: CloneCore 覆寫<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.CloneCore%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.CloneCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CloneCore method calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: CloneCore 方法呼叫<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters> instance that represents the copy.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters>表示該複本執行個體。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters>

trans-unit.source: Creates a key identifier clause for a token.
trans-unit.target: 建立權杖的金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a key identifier clause using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.CreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method, with `referenceStyle` as a generic parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會建立金鑰識別碼子句使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.CreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A>方法，與`referenceStyle`當做泛型參數。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.CreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A>

trans-unit.source: The token.
trans-unit.target: 語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The reference style of the security token.
trans-unit.target: 安全性權杖參考樣式。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause for a token.
trans-unit.target: 權杖的金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: token is .
trans-unit.target: tokenis .

trans-unit.source: referenceStyle is not or .
trans-unit.target: referenceStyleis not or .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the token has an asymmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示權杖是否具有非對稱金鑰。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性永遠傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Asymmetric keys are used in public-key cryptography, which uses two keys, a public key and a private key, which are related mathematically.
trans-unit.target: 非對稱金鑰會用於公開金鑰加密中，而會使用兩個索引鍵、 公開金鑰和私密金鑰以數學方式相關。

trans-unit.source: The public key is distributed widely, but the private key is kept secret.
trans-unit.target: 公開金鑰會廣泛地散發，但是私密金鑰保密。

trans-unit.source: In public-key cryptography, there is no need to exchange a common key.
trans-unit.target: 在公開金鑰加密中，沒有需要交換共同金鑰。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the token has an asymmetric key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果權杖具有非對稱金鑰。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a security token requirement.
trans-unit.target: 初始化安全性權杖的需求。

trans-unit.source: The following properties of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement> are initialized: - If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireClientCertificate%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.TokenType%2A> = <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenTypes.MutualSslnego%2A>; otherwise, it is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenTypes.AnonymousSslnego%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列屬性的<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement>初始化:-如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireClientCertificate%2A>是`true`， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.TokenType%2A>= <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenTypes.MutualSslnego%2A>; 否則它會設為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenTypes.AnonymousSslnego%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenTypes.AnonymousSslnego%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenTypes.MutualSslnego%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.TokenType%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireClientCertificate%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.RequireCryptographicToken%2A> = `true`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.RequireCryptographicToken%2A> = `true`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.RequireCryptographicToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The `SupportSecurityContextCancellation` property in <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.Properties%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireCancellation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -`SupportSecurityContextCancellation`中<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.Properties%2A>設為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireCancellation%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireCancellation%2A></xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.Properties%2A>屬性

trans-unit.source: - The `IssuedSecurityTokenParameters` property in <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.Properties%2A> is set to a clone of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: -`IssuedSecurityTokenParameters`屬性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.Properties%2A>設為目前的執行個體的複製品。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.Properties%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.KeyType%2A> = <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyType>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.KeyType%2A> = <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyType>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyType></xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.KeyType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The requirement of the security token.
trans-unit.target: 安全性權杖的需求。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether cancellation is required.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否需要取消。

trans-unit.source: If cancellation is required, then the security context token issued at the end of the SSL protocol is session based; otherwise, it is cookie based.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要取消，則 SSL 通訊協定結束時發出的安全性內容權杖是工作階段為基礎;否則，它會以 cookie 為基礎。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if cancellation is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果取消是必要的。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a client certificate is required.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否需要用戶端憑證。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a client certificate is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用戶端憑證是必要項;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When implemented, gets a value that indicates whether the token supports client authentication.
trans-unit.target: 實作時，取得值，表示權杖是否支援用戶端驗證。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the token supports client authentication; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果權杖支援用戶端驗證，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When implemented, gets a value that indicates whether the token supports a Windows identity for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 實作時，取得值，指出權杖是否支援使用 Windows 身分識別進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the token supports a Windows identity for authentication; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果權杖支援使用 Windows 身分識別進行驗證，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When implemented, gets a value that indicates whether the token supports server authentication.
trans-unit.target: 實作時，取得值，表示權杖是否支援伺服器驗證。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性永遠傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the token supports server authentication; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果權杖支援伺服器驗證，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Displays a text representation of this instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: 顯示的文字表示類別的這個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The method displays the name of this class, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireCancellation%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireClientCertificate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會顯示這個類別的名稱<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireCancellation%2A>，和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireClientCertificate%2A>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireClientCertificate%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.RequireCancellation%2A>

trans-unit.source: A text representation of this instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: 類別的這個執行個體的文字表示。
